overview:
Logan is actually a nickname. He was given this nickname due to his gruff appearance and often untamed hair. The name comes from the comic book character Wolverine, who’s real name is Logan.

Logan worked for many electronics retailers in the past. He also acted in several stage plays, independent films, and improv comedy shows.

Drawing upon his acting and computer skills he landed a job as spokesperson for TigerDirect and CompUSA. While there he starred in almost 1000 web videos, several commercials, and he participated in the first live online broadcast presented by an online retailer.

Now he owns and operates a very active blog (razetheworld.com) dedicated to geeks, gamers, hardware, and software. He is still active in the online video world as well.
